QuestData.Title: Black Rook Hold: The Lord of Black Rook Hold
QuestData.Description:
While investigating the remains of Black Rook Hold, our Champions were ambushed! The Lord of the Rook appears to have allied himself with the Legion.
We need your assistance to defeat his growing army, and bring him down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Lord Kur'talos Ravencrest in Black Rook Hold.

Objectives.Objective: Defeat Lord Kur'talos Ravencrest in Black Rook Hold
